alert.note: Alert for Wahkiakum (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 05 at 2:52PM PST until December 06 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Washington... Grays River at Covered Bridge near Rosburg affecting Wahkiakum County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Grays River at Covered Bridge near Rosburg. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...Around 16.0 feet, expect major flooding of lowland areas and roads in the vicinity of Hwy 4 and Rosburg. Numerous road closures are likely. Some buildings in low areas near the river are threatened with flooding above this level. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 PM PST Tuesday the stage was 15.9 feet. - Bankfull stage is 11.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:15 PM PST Tuesday was 16.2 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall below flood stage late this evening to 7.3 feet early Saturday morning. It will then rise to 8.9 feet early Sunday morning. It will fall to 7.4 feet Wednesday, December 13 then rise again. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 100 AM PST.
